TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 262,000 to 275,000 head versus 278,000 week ago and 277,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 126,000 to 130,000 head versus 131,000 week ago and 132,000 a year ago. Reuter
